public class DocumentTypeNode
extends Node

This class represents a document type declaration in an XML document.

Author:
Frank Font (mrfont@room4me.com)
See Also:
Node, SmallXMLParser

DocumentTypeNode

public DocumentTypeNode(java.lang.String sRawText)
                 throws MalformedXMLException
Creates an instance of a ProcessingInstructionNode. Pass in the raw text of the processing instruction.
Parameters:
sRawText - Pass in the raw text between the <? and > markers.
Method Detail

getDecoratedText

public java.lang.String getDecoratedText()

getDecoratedText

public java.lang.String getDecoratedText(java.lang.String sLineBreak)
Returns the doctype text within the <!DOCTYPE and > markers using line breaks.
Parameters:
sLineBreak - Override the "\n" settings through this parameter.
Returns:
the doctype text within the <!DOCTYPE and > markers.
